subject: Anniversary Tribute
text:
We gather here to honor them
 Respecting love that gave us birth.
 We are the branches of that stem
 Who wish them long life on the earth.

 It's not just what our law decrees
 That calls us to bestow this praise;
 But what we feel on bended knees
 In gratitude for all their days.

 We can't repay our loving home
 Nor wisdom laced with aiming high.
 We can recall the strength they've shown
 And courage just enough to try.

 Lord, grant this union as before
 Has two hearts beat in harmony.
 The years fulfilled and many more.
 Their lives with us... our treasury!
